name: Afifa'sstore
0:
”Alexa, open amazing islam”
”Alexa, start amazing islam”
”Alexa, ask amazing islam for a fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: amazing islam
des: Ask Alexa for an interesting list of facts about Islam. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next fact. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
